title: India to discuss EU carbon tax in next round of FTA talks
description: India will address the EU's import levy on high carbon goods in upcoming free trade agreement talks from September 23-27. The discussions will focus on the Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism, with both sides aiming to resolve trade issues related to environmental policies, according to India's trade ministry.
